mobile.name: black pawn
mobile.short_description: the Pawn of the Black Court
mobile.long_description: You see a pawn standing here waiting for orders.
mobile.description: The Black Pawn looks quite like a small knight without his powerful steed. His armor is shiny and black. He stands ready to give his life for the Crown.

mobile.name: white pawn
mobile.short_description: the Pawn of the White Court
mobile.long_description: You see a pawn standing here waiting for orders.
mobile.description: The White Pawn looks quite like a small knight without his powerful steed. His armor is spotless and white. He stands ready to give his life for the Crown.

mobile.name: black rook castle
mobile.long_description: In the corner you see a large, black, stone castle on wheels.
mobile.description: The Black Rook is a very large man-made tomb on wheels. Just from the looks of it, it will probably be YOUR tomb.

mobile.name: white rook castle
mobile.long_description: In the corner you see a large, white, stone castle on wheels.
mobile.description: The White Rook is a very large man-made tomb on wheels. Just from the looks of it, it will probably be YOUR tomb.

mobile.name: black knight
mobile.long_description: Here stands a magnificent knight of the dark realm.
mobile.description: The Black Knight is here, riding his ebony black war horse. His eyes flash behind his visor in vengence.

mobile.name: white knight
mobile.long_description: Here stands a magnificent knight of the light realm.
mobile.description: The White Knight is here, riding his ivory white war horse. His eyes gleam behind his visor in joy.

mobile.name: black bishop priest
mobile.description: The Black Bishop seems willing to help you straight into your grave so he can bless you properly.

mobile.name: white bishop priest
mobile.description: The White Bishop seems willing to help you in any possible so that he can attain a higher spirituality.

mobile.name: black queen
mobile.description: The Black Queen is a strikingly beautiful woman with pale skin and a mass of dark hair that crowns her head like a black cloud. If looks could kill, you would already be dead.

mobile.name: white queen
mobile.description: The White Queen is a stunningly beautiful woman with dark skin and a mass of light hair that frames her head like the sun. This is surely love at first sight for you.

mobile.name: black king
mobile.description: The Black King is a menacing figure. You can easily understand why he is the king and you are not.

mobile.name: white king
mobile.description: The White King is a stately figure. You can easily understand why he is the king and you are not.
